raw_response:
Peanut Buddy Bars, as a Tunisian Jewish Djerban dish inspired by American-style peanut butter and chocolate bars, would visually resemble solid, layered bars with a rich, nutty appearance. They are **solid in consistency**, resembling a dense, chewy or moist bar rather than a liquid or stew. When served, these bars typically come as **individual rectangular pieces**, about the size of typical snack bars (roughly 3 to 4 inches long and about 1 inch wide).
